featured.title: Piemonte
featured.subtitle: Italy's wine country awaits
featured.description: Discover Italy's wine country through the eyes of someone who's actually walked its cobblestone streets, tasted its truffles, and mapped out the real costs of living here. From Barolo vineyards to Turin's elegant piazzas, this is your comprehensive guide to retiring in Piemonte.

newsletters.title: Piemonte
newsletters.description: Wine country elegance meets Alpine beauty. Explore Barolo villages, truffle markets, and the cost of la dolce vita in Piemonte.

newsletters.title: Puglia
newsletters.description: Sun-drenched coastlines, trulli houses, and olive groves as far as the eye can see. Puglia's affordable elegance awaits.
